At @AQPulse, we watch this closely.
Breadth tells us if the rally is built on solid ground or just hype in a handful of names.
ğŸ” Our tools track:
â€¢ $RSP vs $SPX
â€¢ % of stocks above 50/200 MA
â€¢ Advance-decline trends
â€¢ Sector breadth

âš ï¸ This is called a breadth divergence when most stocks arenâ€™t following the leaders.
Historically, this signaled trouble ahead:
â€¢ 1972
â€¢ 1990
â€¢ 2000
But not always.
In 2014 and 2017, the market shook it off.
